title: response with result of 'null' from eth_getTransactionByHash running archive mode
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon/2.48.0/linux-amd64/go1.19.10

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 0x0a0259869ab56e175984923358b3fb908faf27e65eb701976f7810de88c59866

erigon command: 
{
        "jsonrpc":"2.0",
        "method":"eth_getTransactionByHash",
        "params":[
                "0x0a0259869ab56e175984923358b3fb908faf27e65eb701976f7810de88c59866"
        ],
        "id":1
}

Chain/Network: Polygon Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": {
        "blockHash": "0x74c7747f2950991377e77bf2858309bfbee0f9164235200c9f423b69490208e7",
        "blockNumber": "0x2bb95b0",
        "from": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
        "gas": "0x0",
        "gasPrice": "0x0",
        "hash": "0x0a0259869ab56e175984923358b3fb908faf27e65eb701976f7810de88c59866",
        "input": "0x",
        "nonce": "0x0",
        "to": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
        "transactionIndex": "0x3e",
        "value": "0x0",
        "type": "0x0",
        "chainId": "0x89",
        "v": "0x0",
        "r": "0x0",
        "s": "0x0"
    }
}

#### Actual behaviour
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": null
}

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
This happens on one of our node while other method and other hash are all working fine. It seems like the bug happens occasionally on archive mode for some transactions. I also found someone already asked this issue in the discord on 01/03/2023 but no one replied this issue. https://discord.com/channels/687972960811745322/983710221308416010/1059717024336580660 
I think this issue is not fixed.
